website_summaries.verdict: With a tensioned deck stay, this skirt is built to keep water out in moderate paddling conditions. It's a good choice if you intend to practice rolls.
pros: Ballistic nylon edge guard with multiple lash pointsZippered mesh deck pocket
Quick-release paddle park.Adjustable neoprene waistband with removable suspenders
Front webbing grab loop for easy exits
cons: Water can pool on the deck of the skirt and drip through, especially if you are not using the suspenders to keep it taut

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: It fits my kayak like a glove. It has a tight seal on the cockpit so stretching it on takes some effort but once in place it’s very secure. I use a Greenland paddle so plenty of water rains down on it yet none gets into the cockpit. Construction and materials are top notch, I expect it to last many years. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne L

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: This spray skirt is very well constructed and it's a visible color. Unfortunately it would not fit my boat's cockpit so I needed to return it. However, let me tell you, the sales representative went out of her way to find out what was wrong and tried to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: OSFurther

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, but still get wet
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for 150 miles in my kayak, mainly on rivers. (not whitewater) It works well, but there is a design flaw. Stay dry until you open up the combing, then the material on top retains water that runs all over you. Have to be very careful to peal it back and you still will get wet. REDESIGN NEEDED.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and (more importantly) easy off during wet exits
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy on and (more importantly) easy off during wet exits. Had no issues attaching the skirt while inside the cockpit. The skirt fits great, prevents water penetration and easy to adjust in the boat. The small zippered pouch is great for sunscreen, camera or phone. All around excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Medium Weight Spray Skirt
customer_reviews.text: Seals makes great products. This Coastal Tour Kayak spray skirt is no exception. The 1.7 size fits my boat while the adjustable, quick release suspenders make a perfect fit for my body. The body band around my mid section is adjustable with velcro as well. I would not expect this spray skirt to do well in white water, but it is not made for that type of adventure. A neoprene skirt would serve better in that application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: I have a large cockpit touring kayak. The sprayskirt received fit perfectly and even had a hoop midway between my body and the front of the cockpit to help shed water by preventing skirt collapse,
customer_reviews.author: kwagunt

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but fit was too tight to get on easily. Probably good on other boats.
customer_reviews.author: F. Smode

customer_reviews.title: Great sprayskirt
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Epic 18x sport nice and tight. Like the zipper pocket in front
customer_reviews.author: ajg6989

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made/ fits tight. I wanted a good skirt and believe I have it in this one. It is high quality. You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: tom stuck

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with my first sea kayak spray skirt
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of a Seals spray skirt. I have a Wilderness Systems Tempest 165 and needed a skirt for open water day trips in the Great Lakes region. This spray skirt is easy to put on, watertight and comfortable. My boyfriend bought the Seals Adventure model spray skirt, and I can say that for 10-15 more mine seems worth it. Before this skirt I owned a pelican rec skirt that was nearly impossible to keep tight and even more impossible to use on trips. I would definitely recommend the Coastal spray skirt.
customer_reviews.author: slowoggie

customer_reviews.title: Great spray skirt for a large cockpit kayak
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous spray skirt for a large cockpit Kestrel. The color is high visibility for both day and night paddling. The batten in the front keeps it from sagging. The pocket is handy for stuff you need quick access to, but don't mind getting wet. The bungees are strong enough to keep the spray skirt secure. Twenty five paddles this summer and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and fits my "vintage" kayak as described.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous order this for a mid-eighties era kayak but my boat was in the list and it fits perfectly. That gives me confidence this brand is for real.
customer_reviews.author: crowcoder

customer_reviews.title: customer service?
customer_reviews.text: Developed a leak and SEALS was not interested in providing me with information concerning resealing the skirt. They told me to talk to the reseller. Not a help at all. No matter where you buy the product, the SEALS name is all over it. A great product just poorly supported.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Very nice skirt. Fits my boat well (Riot Edge) and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice skirt. Fits my boat well (Riot Edge) and seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: zemlin

customer_reviews.title: nice skirt
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these on a tandem and they work great. they fit allot of different sized people so you don't have to buy several.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best spray skirt I've ever used on a touring kayak. It's handled some pretty rough seas for 2 seasons. Never fails me.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need on cooler days when kayaking on the Bay of Fundy. It fits very well.
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Seals Coastal Tour Kayak Spray Skirt-1.7Deck
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this spray skirt. This was my first 'Seals' product and it is just as was advertised. It seems durable and it fit my boat. Only complaint is the one I received was all black, not yellow & black as pictured, but I can live with that. Performance is more important anyway.
customer_reviews.author: John  Perna

customer_reviews.title: seems ok
customer_reviews.text: this is the first spray skirt I have purchased, it seems ok the listing says it has some kind of paddle rest, but I can't figure out what that is supposed to be, other than you can rest the paddle across your lap so that is disappointing. the zipped pocket is nice it fits my oru kayak it gets very wet, and water seems to go through it pretty easily, I am going to try some water repellant spray to seal it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually have the same one and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my kayaking dad. I actually have the same one and love it!
customer_reviews.author: OuiEcrit

customer_reviews.title: Quality finishing
customer_reviews.text: I've just used it the once in slightly choppy seas. Previously I've used a neoprene skirt so I was a little unsure of how this would feel and perform. It was excellent. The cockpit stayed completely dry. It is also comfortable to wear and easily put on and released.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sprayskirt from Seals
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprayskirt from Seals. Fits my 17' touring kayak nicely. Been pleased with every Seals product I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Do-it

product_meta.title: SEALS Coastal Tour Sprayskirt
product_meta.description: Seals Coastal Tour Spray Skirt - The perfect spray skirt for moderate conditions with adjustable neoprene no-slip waist closure and removable suspenders. The Coastal spray skirt gently hugs the waist keeping you warm and dry without trapping you in the spray skirt. This spray skirt fits on kayaks easily and the zipper pocket on top is perfect for your odds and ends items you need with you.
feature_bullets: Spray protection for moderate paddling conditions
Medium-weight coated nylon packcloth with Ballistic nylon wear guards with lash loops
Adjustable neoprene waistband with removable suspenders

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
